pkgmetadata.longdescription: Minimax and Minimax Projection Designs // Provides two main functions: mMcPSO() and miniMaxPro(), which generates minimax designs and minimax projection designs using a hybrid clustering - particle swarm optimization (PSO) algorithm. These designs can be used in a variety of settings, e.g., as space- filling designs for computer experiments or sensor allocation designs. A detailed description of the two designs and the employed algorithms can be found in Mak and Joseph (2016) https://arxiv.org/abs/1602.03938.
